titleStmt.title: The mysterie of God, concerning the whole creation, mankinde To be made known to every man and vvoman, after seaven dispensations and seasons of time are passed over. According to the councell of God, revealed to his servants. By Gerrard Winstanley.
titleStmt.author: Winstanley, Gerrard, b. 1609.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by I.C. for Giles Calvert, at the Black-spread-Eagle, at the west end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.

place.placeName: the Black-spread-Eagle, at the west end of Pauls
